timeline.scrub: Click or drag to scrub timeline

dialog.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save?

about.title: About METS
about.description: METS (Mechanical Equipment Timing Simulator) is a professional mechanism motion timing visualization tool for simulating and analyzing the motion timing of mechanical equipment.
about.license: This software is protected by copyright. All rights reserved.

help.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
help.description: Use the following keyboard shortcuts to operate METS more efficiently

tips.title: Usage Tips
tips.tip1: Double-click the toolbar to toggle fullscreen mode
tips.tip2: Drag and drop CSV files to the window for quick import
tips.tip3: Use mouse wheel to zoom the canvas
tips.tip4: Hold Shift while dragging to select multiple modules

userGuide.title: User Guide
userGuide.introduction: METS is a professional mechanism motion timing visualization tool for simulating and analyzing the motion timing of mechanical equipment. This guide will help you get started quickly and make full use of METS features.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.step1: Click the 'Load Test Data' button or import a CSV file
quickStart.step2: Use the playback controls to start the animation
quickStart.step3: Adjust speed and view settings for the best experience

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.step1: After launching METS, you'll see the main interface with a parameter table, canvas, and toolbar.
gettingStarted.step2: The parameter table on the left shows detailed information for all modules, including module names, action descriptions, and timing parameters.
gettingStarted.step3: The canvas area on the right displays the mechanism motion timing relationships in a visual format.
gettingStarted.step4: The toolbar provides quick access to all main functions, including import, playback controls, export, and settings.

importingData.title: Importing Data
importingData.csvFormat: Supports CSV format data import. Files should contain columns for module name, action description, start position, cell count, and duration.
importingData.requiredColumns: Required columns: Module Name, Action Description, Start Position, Cell Count, Duration, Stage.
importingData.dragDrop: You can drag and drop CSV files directly into the application window for quick import.
importingData.testData: Click the 'Load Test Data' button to load sample data for testing and learning functions.

animationControls.title: Animation Controls
animationControls.playPause: Use the play/pause button or spacebar to control animation playback.
animationControls.stop: The stop button will halt the animation and maintain the current position.
animationControls.reset: The reset button will return the animation to the starting position.
animationControls.speed: Use speed controls to adjust animation playback speed, supporting 0.1x to 4x speed range.

visualization.title: Visualization Features
visualization.modules: Each module is represented by colored bars, with length representing execution time.
visualization.stages: Actions in different stages are displayed with different color tones for easy differentiation.
visualization.timing: Timing relationships are shown through horizontal position and length, clearly displaying action execution order and overlap relationships.
visualization.colors: Color coding helps quickly identify actions from different modules and stages.

exporting.title: Export Functions
exporting.formats: Supports multiple export formats: Excel, PDF, PNG, and MP4.
exporting.excel: Excel export includes complete parameter tables and calculation results.
exporting.pdf: PDF export provides high-quality report format.
exporting.images: PNG export can generate static images, MP4 export can generate animated videos.

additionalHelp.title: Additional Help
additionalHelp.shortcuts: View keyboard shortcuts to improve operation efficiency.
additionalHelp.about: The About page contains application version and developer information.
additionalHelp.support: For technical support, please contact the Motionforge team.
